sentences.english: That apparently made quite an impression on the president's young daughter.
sentences.chinese: 着很显然给总统的小女儿留下了很深的印象。

sentences.english: The less girl were inconsolable at the loss of IT kitten.
sentences.chinese: 那个小女刚出生的孩子因失去她的小猫而伤心不已。

sentences.english: Another 9-year old girl died after being admitted to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 另外一名年仅9岁的小女孩在被送入医院后不治。

sentences.english: The little girl stood in the very back of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 这个小女孩站在教室的最后面。

sentences.english: She was a very brave little girl – she dared to do all kinds of things.
sentences.chinese: 她是个很胆大的小女孩，她什么事都敢做。

sentences.english: He kissed her again and she changed back into his pretty little daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他又亲吻了她一下，他美丽的小女儿就变回来了。

sentences.english: A little girl came to visit the country home, but was very bored.
sentences.chinese: 一个无聊的小女孩来到了农家院。

sentences.english: When she was a small girl, she could hum songs and correct the tone.
sentences.chinese: 当她还是和小女孩的时候，她就能哼歌和教音了。

sentences.english: The tall man bent forward to listen to the little girl.
sentences.chinese: 那高个男子弯下身来听那小女孩的话。

sentences.english: No - all these small girls -- they must build Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 而是所有的这些小女孩，这是他们的使命。

sentences.english: Once upon a time a little girl tried to make a living by selling matches in the street.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，一个小女孩试图使生活在街上卖火柴。

sentences.english: All you have accomplished, honourable teacher, for my backward daughter!
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的老师，小女浅陋无知，承蒙您教诲。

sentences.english: The little girl cuddled her pet cat.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩拥抱着她的宠物猫。

sentences.english: Kids love animals but is it possible for little girls to love leeches?
sentences.chinese: 孩子们都喜欢小动物，但是小女孩可能会喜欢蚂蟥吗？

sentences.english: Other significant subplots include the adventures of Lydia, the youngest Bennet daughter.
sentences.chinese: 其它重要的次要情节包括班奈特家小女丽迪雅的冒险。

sentences.english: The little girl will get a candy if she gives a right answer.
sentences.chinese: 若小女孩问闭于问题就可以失到一颗糖。

definition: to come with a specific purpose in mind
(old) your servant (humble self-reference by young female)
